title: Procurement of Oil and Lubricants for the Sri Lanka Transport Board Buses.
decision_details: - The proposal made by Hon. Nimal Siripala de Silva, the Minister of Transport and Civil Aviation, to award the contract for the procurement of Oil and Lubricants for the buses of the Sri Lanka Transport Board to M/s Lanka IOC PLC, M/s Chevron Lubricant Lanka PLC and M/s McLarens Lubricant Ltd., as recommended by the Standing Cabinet Appointed Procurement Committee, was approved by the Cabinet.
